name: Surveyors
description:
Surveyors

------------------

Background:
In the distant future, humans have found themselves forced to travel to other planets in order to extract much needed resources. One of those planets is Leron, a unique planet whith strange gravitational anomalies. You play as a surveyor working for The Corporation. Your mission is to explore Leron's endless cave systems to provide your employers valuable data and resources. But be careful, these caves are crawling with hostile worm-like creatures known as Shrieks. Shrieks have shown genetic mutations related to the minerals present in the caves they inhabit, some minerals makes them faster while other makes them reproduce in higher numbers.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim turret
Left click - Fire
E - Change to mining mode
Tab - Expand mini map
Escape - Go back to menu

Additional info:
Surveyors was made by a solo developer during one week as a part of the procedural jam of 2018.
